topic.title: Buffer Pre-fill

body.p: All hysteresis buffers (physical or virtual) are automatically filled to the desired center point when starting signal acquisition such that the hysteresis buffer is centered. When transitioning rate, the centered hysteresis buffer provides adequate protection from both underflows and overflows.
